text: Nirmala College, Ranchi, is a general degree college in the Jharkhand state of India. This is a Christian Minority Institution, founded in August 1969 by the Society of Sisters of Charity of Jesus and Mary. It offers intermediate and degree courses in arts and sciences. It is affiliated to Ranchi University. ==See also== *Education in India *Ranchi University *Literacy in India *List of institutions of higher education in Jharkhand ==References== ==External links== * http://www.nirmalacollegeranchi.com/ * Category:Colleges affiliated to Ranchi University Category:Educational institutions established in 1969 Category:Universities and colleges in Ranchi Category:Universities and colleges in Jharkhand
title: Nirmala College, Ranchi
